content:
In Singapore, several agencies are involved in the development and testing of new hearing technologies, including:

1. National University of Singapore (NUS)
2. Duke-NUS Medical School
3. National University Health System (NUHS)
4. Singapore General Hospital (SGH)
5. KK Women's and Children's Hospital (KKH)
6. Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A\*STAR)

These agencies have dedicated departments and research centers that specialize in audiology and hearing technology. They often collaborate with industry partners and international institutions to advance the development and testing of new hearing technologies. These agencies also have clinical services that provide diagnostic and treatment services for patients with hearing loss, giving them access to the latest technologies and treatments.
